name: Nicola Lloyd
background: Nicola Lloyd serves as Commissioning Editor, Factual at ITV. Focus areas: Documentaries, current affairs.
thematic_priorities: access-led documentary series into British institutions or communities
Presenter-led documentary series with established talent
history docs with strong narrative storytelling
science and natural history accessible to mainstream audiences
format_specifications: Preferred format: Series (3–4 episodes) with return potential
Limited interest in singles unless tied to significant events
budget_parameters: Documentary: £100K–£250K per hour; Specialist Factual: £120K–£280K per hour
technical_requirements: subtitles/captions; audio description per broadcaster requirements
current_calls: Reflect latest broadcaster priorities as outlined above; commissioner-specific interests included.
submission_process: One-page outline with headline, premise and format
additional_info: Diversity and inclusion is emphasized; encouragement of sustainable production practices; support for projects across the UK; open to pitches from independent producers/companies
